    #include <iostream>
    #include <queue>
    #include <cstdio>
    #include<stack>
    using namespace std;
     
    int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    priority_queue<int> pq;
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--){
    int emp;
    scanf("%d",&emp);
    pq.push(emp);
    }
    //int arr[n+1];
    stack<int> s;
    while(!pq.empty()){
    s.push(pq.top());
    pq.pop();
    }
    while(!s.empty()){
    printf("%d ",s.top());
    s.pop();
    }
    cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
